column5: $475 plus tax
Can you camp there or just for the day I have seen people BBQin there before

I see people with tent trailers there, I don't think anyone would even care. Bayview marina in Port Rowan is $500 I believe and there is plenty of room for a camper there.  I have to speak with Old Cut in the next couple of weeks so I'll find out for ya.
Cool thanks buddy
Great looking boat!
nice ride ive got to run into you and dan out on the bay this year. that deal at fin and feather sounds pretty good. id be interested but the boat visits lots of other places too.
Congrats on the new ride!!  ....I bought my new/used ride last year so I know exactly how you feel..soft water will come quick enough
Thanks guys and gals ! Smally let us know mabye we can make a point of meeting up one weekend on the water .
Congrats on your new Lund!. I got the Rebel sport 1625 last year and really like it. Really stabile in the water, planes easily and well constructed!!
Thanks Devy its good to hear first hand reveiws couldn't even find a single vid on you tube for the 1825.
Very nice, Shawn!!!!!  You'll have a blast with that baby!  PS- Spincast (Rick) just remember who to contact for selling your boat, when you do upgrade

Thanks Frank can't wait to get it on DC for the fish-a-thon so I can see whats really going on down there in the deep waters with the HDS7 unfortunately I wont have the structure scan by then but I have never really had a good graph so it will be cool to see were the fish are specifically the browns.
Beautiful boat!  Should handle the big water nicely!
Thanks it will definately allow me to get out more and the bay won't be a problem.
Only pic I could find on the net that didn't have people in it LOL pick it up end of april cant wait got a 80lb minn-kota and a HDS 7 on her with a 90hp merc now I just need to sell the starcraft LOL
Congrats on the new ride, she looks like a beaut !!
awesome, congrats!
Very nice SRT8. Congrats. Get it at the show? They had some great deals. I was really tempted to move up to and 18 or 20 fter when I saw the deals they were offering. Bad case of 2 foot-itis
Most envious. Congrats on the sweet purchase
DITTO
Can't sleep eh? 'Gratz on the new ride!
Very nice,reminds me of my previous Alumacraft I am sure it will serve you well!
Nice Buddy!
Awesome!
Congrats !!! Of course ya know, its gonna be a long long long long month of March. I bought mine in January, and i've been nutzo ever since. I also pick mine up in April.  Paul
i heard were getting a deep freeze this year that will last until november!

Thanks guys I'm supper excited !!! SC I didn't get it at the show but I did get a deal because of it ,I always used to say I would never buy a lund until I saw the price of this one .SP I was on nights and found out everything was good to go while I was at work but now I'm up again with hardly any sleep .Skeet your just mean  I can't wait to get her all slimy
What a beauty.  Congrats.
the new rebels are beatiful rigs.  time to play the waiting game

Yeah that was the reason I decided to go with a lund the price is way better than a few years ago this boat was the same $$$$ as a 17' SC I priced out from another brand and had a cheap finder ,TM and no travel cover .
hope ya went with the galvie trailer.  always worth the few extra bucks.
Welcome to the waiting game If i can help you make it till april, just let me know.....24hrs a day, 7 days a week. Together we will make it
LOL thanks for the support
NICE!!! You'll be very happy with it.  Congrats
I may have a spot for it for the spring, to save from towing it down.
Cool buddy I was thinking about that was gonna get a spot at fin & feather so we could camp down there all the time
Cheapest is right at old cut, spot next to me is open, that would make for some good times!
yeah but can ya camp down there we want to spend a bunch of weekends down at the bay either tenting or in the in-laws motorhome whats the damage for a slip for the season ?
